alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 3:48AM EST until February 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Estill and Powell Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.8 feet on 03/13/1963. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 3 PM EST Friday.
